scripts.sync-demos: tsc scripts/sync-demos.ts --target es2020 --module NodeNext --moduleResolution NodeNext --outDir dist/scripts --esModuleInterop --resolveJsonModule --skipLibCheck && node --enable-source-maps dist/scripts/sync-demos.js
scripts.sync-spotify: tsc scripts/sync-spotify-top-tracks.ts --target es2020 --module NodeNext --moduleResolution NodeNext --outDir dist/scripts --esModuleInterop --resolveJsonModule --skipLibCheck --sourceMap && node --enable-source-maps dist/scripts/sync-spotify-top-tracks.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run sync-demos && npm run sync-spotify
